message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. I believe it could greatly benefit you as well. Would you like to purchase it for $150?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $120.  Would you be willing to come down to $130?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to negotiate further. How about we agree on $140 for the product?
Alice, I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  $140 is still a bit high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, how about we settle on $137 for the product?
Alice, I'm getting closer to my budget.  Would you be willing to meet me at $133?
Thank you for your patience, Bob. Considering our negotiation history, how about we agree on $135 for the product?
Alice, I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $132? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts to stay within your budget, Bob. Considering our negotiation, how about we agree on $133 for the product?
